description: Map all samples of a waveform below a certain absolute magnitude to zero

implementations.source:
import numpy as np

def numpy_zero_suppression(values, threshold):
    result = np.zeros_like(values)
    selector = np.abs(values) >= threshold
    result[selector] = values[selector]
    return result
implementations.name: numpy
numba_single_thread

name: Zero Suppression
